metadata.title: CVE-2018-18751 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in GNU gettext 0.19.8. There is a double free indefault_add_message in read-catalog.c, related to an invalid free inpo_gram_parse in po-gram-gen.y, as demonstrated by lt-msgfmt.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-18751` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

autopoint - 0.19.8.1-6ubuntu0.1
gettext - 0.19.8.1-6ubuntu0.1
gettext-base - 0.19.8.1-6ubuntu0.1
gettext-el - 0.19.8.1-6ubuntu0.1
libasprintf0v5 - 0.19.8.1-6ubuntu0.1
libgettextpo0 - 0.19.8.1-6ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gettext package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.19.8.1-6ubuntu0.1').
